problem_names:
lemma Afix_restr_subst:
  assumes "x \<notin> S"
  assumes "y \<notin> S"
  assumes "domA \<Gamma> \<subseteq> S"
  shows "Afix \<Gamma>[x::h=y]\<cdot>ae f|` S = Afix \<Gamma>\<cdot>(ae f|` S) f|` S"
translations:
lemma Afix_restr_subst:
  assumes "x \<notin> S"
  assumes "y \<notin> S"
  assumes "domA \<Gamma> \<subseteq> S"
  shows "Afix \<Gamma>[x::h=y]\<cdot>ae f|` S = Afix \<Gamma>\<cdot>(ae f|` S) f|` S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Afix \<Gamma>[x::h=y]\<cdot>ae f|` S =
    Afix \<Gamma>\<cdot>(ae f|` S) f|` S
